revised_title: Investigating the Individual Tides at Southampton and Ipswich
tldr: The author examines the individual tides at Southampton and Ipswich, observing irregularities in the times and heights of high and low water. Despite these irregularities, the tidal curves for the tides on both sides of a particular low water point are undistinguishable, suggesting that the observed peculiarities are real and not due to accidental circumstances of weather.
